channel.title: [DSPK] Random Disconnect
channel.description: Ok the issue is after my server is on for a little bit the server will DC everyone and when you try to sign in it will say try again in 60 seconds. I do not know whats causing the DC but it happens frequently enough to notice. I use linux but it happened on windows as well. I use a DSPK base but i would just like this random dc fixed because it makes players quit.
